/usr/bin/c++   -O2     -Wl,--export-dynamic CMakeFiles/jacobi_mpi_overlap.dir/src/jacobi_mpi_overlap.cpp.o  -o jacobi_mpi_overlap -rdynamic /opt/mpi/bullxmpi/1.2.7.2/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /opt/mpi/bullxmpi/1.2.7.2/lib/libmpi.so -ldl -lm -lnuma -lrt -lnsl -lutil -lm -ldl -lnuma -lrt -lnsl -lutil -Wl,-rpath,/opt/mpi/bullxmpi/1.2.7.2/lib:
